    • Method Detail

      • valueNameEL

        public boolean valueNameEL(java.lang.String name)
        DES: the method analyzes whether a text string ends with "el".
        Parameters:
        name - this parameter indicates the name to which the last two letters will be revised. !=null.
        Returns:
        a logical value is returned which tells us that if it is true it ends in "el" and if it is false it does not end in "el".

      • valuePower

        public boolean valuePower(java.lang.String power)
        DES: this method evaluates if there is an angel with that power.
        PRE: the list of angels must be created.
        Parameters:
        power - is the name of the power that is to be compared to each of the powers of other angels. != null.
        Returns:
        a logical value is returned which if true means that there is no angel with that power, and if it is false it means that if there are angels with that power.

      • valueName

        public boolean valueName(java.lang.String name)
        DES: this method evaluates if there is an angel with the same name.
        PRE: the list of angels must be created.
        Parameters:
        name - is the name that will compare with the name of each of the other angels. !=null.
        Returns:
        this method returns a logical value which if true would indicate that there is no angel with that name, and if it returns a false it means that that name already has an angel.

      • createAngel

        public java.lang.String createAngel(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.String picture,
                                    java.lang.String prayer,
                                    java.lang.String power,
                                    java.lang.String month,
                                    int day,
                                    model.Candle candle)
        DES: this method creates an angel with all its characteristics.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the angel. !=null.
        picture - is the direction where the angel image is located. !=null
        prayer - is the prayer of the angel. !=null.
        power - is the power of the angel. !=null.
        month - is the month that celebrates the angel. !=null.
        day - is the day that celebrates the angel. !=null.
        candle - are the characteristics of the angel candle.!=null.
        Returns:
        returns a message that tells us if the angel was created or not.

        Parameters:
